hero.intro_p1: I'm Pham Huy Dat, a Java Developer with
hero.intro_p2: years of experience building scalable microservices, optimizing databases, and ensuring high-availability enterprise applications.

about.title: About Me
about.p1_pre: I am a Java Developer with
about.p1_post: years of experience designing and developing enterprise-grade applications. My expertise lies in leveraging the Spring ecosystem (Spring Boot, Spring Cloud) and Microservices architecture to build scalable solutions.
about.p2: I have a proven track record in integrating RESTful and SOAP Web Services, optimizing high-volume data processing, and ensuring system resilience. I am committed to delivering clean, efficient code that meets rigorous business requirements.
about.p3: Currently, I am focused on modernizing legacy systems and enhancing performance through advanced caching strategies, database optimization, and containerization with Docker.

description: Umoney Project: Optimized reading/handling of large Excel files, reducing memory usage and improving performance by 3–5x.
Enhanced bulk insert/update operations for large datasets, achieving 5–10x faster performance.
Simulated payment timeout and failure scenarios to improve system resilience.
BCCS 2.0 Project: Developed core modules for product and service management.
Optimized database queries to improve speed of storing and retrieving large-scale telecom data.
KhangBaby Project: Developed backend services for product, inventory, and order management systems.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs for web applications.
Built user interfaces for sales and inventory modules ensuring usability.
Collaborated with business stakeholders to refine requirements and deliver core features.
M-Value Project: Migrated legacy Web MVC features to RESTful APIs to support mobile app integration.
Developed UI components for the mobile asset valuation app.
Carcassonne Project: Designed core game logic including tile placement and rule validation.
Implemented scalable architecture for smooth gameplay interactions.

items.title: Umoney - Digital Payment Platform
items.description: A microservices-based financial platform for secure money transfers and bill payments. Optimized large-scale Excel processing by 3-5x and improved bulk data handling by 10x.

items.title: BCCS 2.0 - Telecom BSS
items.description: Business Support System for the telecom industry managing products, services, and pricing. Implemented core modules and optimized database queries for large-scale data.

items.title: KhangBaby Inventory System
items.description: Sales and inventory management system designed to track stock and process orders. Built backend RESTful APIs and sales interfaces to streamline operations.

items.title: M-Value & Carcassonne
items.description: Asset valuation app migrated to RESTful APIs for mobile integration, and a digital board game implementation focusing on core logic and rule validation.

contact.subtext: Whether you have a question about backend architecture, need help with a migration, or just want to connect, I'm available.
